languages.text: Непонятное, судя по всему, друкхарское устройство.

traits.locale_text: Непонятное, судя по всему, друкхарское устройство.

languages.text: Любые манипуляции бесплодны — ксеноустройство отказывается пробуждаться.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.
languages.original_text: Любые манипуляции бесплодны — ксеноустройство отказывается пробуждаться.

traits.locale_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenos device refuses to come to life.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenos device refuses to come to life.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenos device refuses to come to life.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenos device refuses to come to life.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.
All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

languages.text: Alle deine Manipulationen bleiben ergebnislos. Das Xeno-Gerät erwacht nicht zum Leben.
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: Alle deine Manipulationen bleiben ergebnislos. Das Xeno-Gerät erwacht nicht zum Leben.

languages.text: Toutes vos manipulations se révèlent vaines. L'appareil xénos refuse de s'activer.
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: Toutes vos manipulations se révèlent vaines. L'appareil xénos refuse de s'activer.

languages.text: Todos tus intentos de manipulación son infructuosos. El xenodispositivo se niega a funcionar.
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: Todos tus intentos de manipulación son infructuosos. El xenodispositivo se niega a funcionar.

languages.text: 你所有的尝试都以失败告终，这台异形装置拒绝启动。
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: 你所有的尝试都以失败告终，这台异形装置拒绝启动。

languages.text: どんなに操作しても、結果は得られなかった。ゼノデバイスは起動を拒んでいる。
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: どんなに操作しても、結果は得られなかった。ゼノデバイスは起動を拒んでいる。

languages.text: Ne yaparsan yap işe yaramıyor. Zeno cihazı, canlanmayı reddediyor.
languages.original_text: All of your manipulations are fruitless. The xenodevice refuses to come to life.

traits.locale_text: Ne yaparsan yap işe yaramıyor. Zeno cihazı, canlanmayı reddediyor.
